featured.title: Enterprise Data Pipeline & Analytics
featured.description: Scalable data processing pipeline for automotive analytics, handling telematics data from connected vehicles. Processes real-time streaming data for business intelligence and operational insights using modern data stack technologies.
highlights: Real-time data ingestion from 10,000+ connected vehicles
Automated data quality validation and anomaly detection
Scalable microservices architecture with fault tolerance
Advanced analytics for predictive maintenance insights

featured.title: Customer Segmentation & Growth Platform
featured.description: Advanced customer analytics platform for automotive services, leveraging machine learning to identify growth opportunities and optimize customer engagement strategies across digital touchpoints.
highlights: ML-driven customer segmentation with 95% accuracy
Real-time personalization engine for digital experiences
A/B testing framework for growth optimization
Executive dashboard with actionable business insights

featured.title: Infrastructure Modernization & DevOps
featured.description: Comprehensive infrastructure modernization initiative migrating legacy systems to cloud-native architecture. Implemented Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD pipelines, and automated monitoring for enterprise-scale operations.
highlights: Infrastructure as Code for 100+ microservices
Zero-downtime deployment pipeline with automated rollbacks
Cost optimization reducing infrastructure spend by 40%
Security-first architecture with automated compliance checks

other.title: Executive Business Intelligence Suite
other.description: Comprehensive business intelligence platform providing real-time insights across operations, finance, and customer metrics. Features automated reporting, predictive analytics, and executive dashboards for data-driven decision making.
highlights: Automated daily executive reporting across 15 business units
Predictive models for revenue forecasting and risk assessment
Self-service analytics empowering business users
Mobile-first dashboards for leadership team

other.title: Business Process Optimization Engine
other.description: Intelligent automation platform identifying and optimizing business processes across departments. Combines process mining, RPA, and analytics to eliminate inefficiencies and reduce operational costs.
highlights: Process mining analysis identifying $1.2M in cost savings
Automated workflows reducing manual tasks by 70%
Real-time process monitoring and optimization alerts
Integration with 25+ business systems and APIs

other.title: Texas Hold'em Hand Analyzer
other.description: Interactive poker hand analyzer that calculates winning probabilities for Texas Hold'em showdowns. Features random card dealing, hand strength evaluation, and real-time odds calculation using Monte Carlo simulation.
highlights: Random card dealing algorithm for realistic gameplay
Monte Carlo simulation for accurate win probability calculation
Real-time hand strength evaluation and ranking
Interactive UI for card selection and scenario testing
Statistical analysis of different starting hands
